metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter acknowledging receipt of $200 and stating the balance due is $85.30, which he trusts will be sent in due season. Stearns expresses his opinions on Chinese governmental affairs and favors a constitutional monarchy until the country is ready for a republic. He supports Luk in his role in educating the Chinese people. He comments on the fine delegation of boys this year, notes where some of the graduates are in college, and closes with a request for a timely reply and updated address.
metadata.note_acquisition: Phillips Academy Archives and Special Collections received the letters and materials of Sung Sing Kwan from Alfred E. Stearns in ____(date)
metadata.note_preferred-citation: From The Trustees of Phillips Academy.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
